Name: Vase of Mesehti or Hes Vase
Description: This vase of Mesehti, Mayor of Asiut, stands on a wooden base and is tall and slender, with a relatively wide rim. It was made of a single sheet of copper. There are no traces of soldering. The surface of the vase is well polished with no writing. This vase is an example of a Hes vase, which was used in libation, or liquid offering, ceremonies and for other ritual purposes.
